Package pizzafactory.classes

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
pizzafactory.classes.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
A customer who may place an order for a pizza.
Since:
19/03/2024
Version:
0.1
Author:
Samuel Stanton

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(int customerNumber, ArrayList<Pizza> pizzaMenu)
      Creates a new customer with a randomly generated order.
      Parameters:
      customerNumber - the customer's ID number.
      pizzaMenu - A copy of the menu, for the customer to look at. (there is probably a better way of doing this)

    • Customer

      public Customer(int customerNumber, Pizza customerPizza, int pizzaQuantity)
      Creates a new customer with a specific order.
      Parameters:
      customerNumber - the customer's ID number.
      customerPizza - the pizza that the customer wants to order.
      pizzaQuantity - the amount of pizzas that the customer wants to order.

  • Method Details

    • placeOrder

      public Order placeOrder(int orderId)
      Prompts the customer to create a new order.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID that the customer's order will have.
      Returns:
      an Order object containing what the customer has chosen to order.

    • serveCustomer

      public static boolean serveCustomer(Order servedOrder)
      Serves the order to the customer, checking if it is the correct order first.
      Parameters:
      servedOrder - The order that is to be served.
      Returns:
      a boolean indicating whether the order has been successfully served or not.
